name: Crisis in Ominomitopia: Eat, Dance, Survive! Hang and Joel's New Year Wishes 2022
name_original: Crisis in Ominomitopia: Eat, Dance, Survive! Hang and Joel's New Year Wishes 2022
description:
There is a crisis in the place called Ominomitopia.

Use the arrow keys to eat and dance through the never-ending crisis and unlock Joel and Hang's secret new year wishes.
